jcurses.event
类 ActionEvent

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.event.Event
      jcurses.event.ActionEvent

public class ActionEvent
extends Event

Instances of this class are generated by widgets if an user makes an action, for example pushes a button or selects a menu item.
